claim: three time a lady have the same week on top as baker street
resp:

1. Identify the song "Three Times a Lady" and find its week(s) on top in the table. It appears from rows 29-25 with a duration of 4 weeks (from 26 August to 16 September).

2. Identify the song "Baker Street" and find its week(s) on top in the table. It appears from rows 29-21 with a duration of 4 weeks (from 26 August to 16 September).

3. Compare the durations and weeks on top for both songs. Notice that they share the same starting date (26 August) and end date (16 September), indicating they had the same number of overlapping days.

4. Since both songs have the same number of overlapping days (4 weeks), they have the same number of weeks on top.

Final answer:
